mapper.select: SELECT a.CD_ID as codeId , a.CD_VAL as codeVal , a.CD_NM as codeName , a.CD_NM_ENG as codeNameEng , a.GRP_VAL as codeGroupName , b.GRP_NM as codeGroupVAl , a.CD_DTL as description , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.REG_DT as regDt , a.UDP_DT as udpDt FROM TB_CMM_CD a, TB_CD_GRP b WHERE a.GRP_VAL=b.GRP_VAL AND a.GRP_VAL=#{codeGroupVAl} AND a.USE_YN='Y'

SELECT GRP_ID as codeGroupId , GRP_VAL as codeGroupVal , GRP_NM as codeGroupName , GRP_NM_ENG as codeGroupNameEng , GRP_DTL as description , USE_YN as useYn , REG_DT as regDt , UDP_DT as udpDt FROM TB_CD_GRP WHERE USE_YN='Y'
